text: Patrick Claude Ekeng Ekeng (26 March 1990 - 6 May 2016) was a Cameroonian professional footballer. He played as a defensive midfielder. He had two international caps for his country's national team. He represented Cameroon at the 2015 Africa Cup of Nations. Ekeng collapsed on 6 May 2016 during a soccer game in Bucharest, Romania. He was rushed to the hospital after suffering from a heart attack. Ekeng died hours later at the age of 26. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Cameroonian footballers Category:People from Yaound√©
title: Patrick Ekeng
